title: tikv-ctl: panic when print raft log
body:
```
./tikv-ctl -d var/db raft log -r 2 -i 8
idx_key: \001\002\000\000\000\000\000\000\000\002\001\000\000\000\000\000\000\000\010
region: 2
log index: 8
entry entry_type: EntryConfChange term: 6 index: 8
thread 'main' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: WireError("unexpected wire type WireTypeVarint")', ../src/libcore/result.rs:799
```
